mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_order(supermarket_id, product_id, number) VALUES (#{supermarketId},#{productId},#{number});
mapper.update: UPDATE sales_order SET supermarket_id=#{supermarketId}, product_id=#{productId}, number=#{number} WHERE order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.order_id as orderId, A.supermarket_id as supermarketId, A.product_id as productId, A.number, B.product_name as productName, B.price, B.sales_price as salesPrice, A.create_time as createTime from sales_order A, product B WHERE A.product_id=B.product_id
mapper.select: and A.supermarket_id=#{supermarketId} and A.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
